'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This large estate in Serpent's Crown was inhabited until recently by [[Muhai]], a talented cartographer. Living alone, nobody noticed her passing - and her lifeless body remained in the bedroom ever since.

==Characters==
* [[Muhai]]: The spirit in the main area.

==Pets==
* [[Eviee]] - "Orphaned Dog": In the bedroom.
